title: Zatoka Sztuki
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant with a view and a unique atmosphere. Cuisine is a mix of seasonal Polish and European styles. As of May 2016, vegan breakast items are oatmeal with fruits and soy milk; savory millet with dry tomatoes, parsley, black olives, peanuts and herbal olive oil. Vegan lunch items are bruschetta with concasse tomatoes, basil and garlic, carpaccio with baked beetroot, nuts, lemon olive oil and arugula; oyster mushroom salad with grilled zucchini, avocado, olives, cherry tomatoes, roasted seeds, nuts and spicy garlic olive oil. Name in English: Bay of Art.
